mapper.select: SELECT IDX, club_name, area, club_type, re_name, hp_number, e_mail, club_item, bigo, homepage, req_date, DEL_GB, CONTENTS FROM StartupClubBoard WHERE club_name like '%${club_name}%' AND DEL_GB = 'N' ORDER BY req_date DESC
SELECT IDX, club_name, area, club_type, re_name, hp_number, e_mail, club_item, bigo, homepage, req_date, DEL_GB, CONTENTS FROM StartupClubBoard WHERE DEL_GB = 'N' ORDER BY req_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO StartupClubBoard ( club_name, area, club_type, re_name, hp_number, e_mail, club_item, bigo, homepage, req_date, CONTENTS ) VALUES ("${club_name}", "${area}", "${club_type}", "${re_name}", "${hp_number}", "${e_mail}", "${club_item}", "${bigo}", "${homepage}", NOW(), '${contents}')
mapper.select: SELECT IDX, club_name, area, club_type, re_name, hp_number, e_mail, club_item, bigo, homepage, req_date, DEL_GB, CONTENTS FROM StartupClubBoard WHERE IDX = #{IDX} AND DEL_GB = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE StartupClubBoard SET club_name = "${club_name}", area = "${area}", club_type = "${club_type}", re_name = "${re_name}", hp_number = "${hp_number}", e_mail = "${e_mail}", club_item = "${club_item}", bigo = "${bigo}", homepage = "${homepage}", req_date = NOW(), CONTENTS = '${contents}' WHERE IDX = "${IDX}"
UPDATE StartupClubBoard SET DEL_GB = 'Y' WHERE IDX = #{IDX}
